div.p: I DON'T THINK HE EVER HEARD THAT BEFORE.
AND FINALLY TONIGHT THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, HAD TO READ A
LOT OF FICTION BECAUSE SO MUCH REAL STUFF TO DIGEST, I HAVE
MORE HOMEWORK THAN MOST KIDS. AND IT'S A VERY EXCITING BOOK,
MUCH BETTER THAN WASHINGTON TV AND MAY KEEP YOU UP NIGHTS.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK OUT "SIX YEARS." THAT'S IT
